metadata.title: CasaCam VS5002 Wireless Security Camera System with 1080p Floodlight Cameras and 7" Touchscreen Monitor, Two-Way Audio, Free APP, 32GB SD Card and Battery Installed (1080p Deluxe FHD Camera)
features: True DIY DVR system with 7” monitor. A security camera and security floodlight light combo. Simply connect the camera to a power supply and experience the ease of use and peace of mind you’ve come to expect from CasaCam!

See, hear and speak to people on your property from your 7” monitor, phone or tablet. Floodlights turn on and start recording as soon as motion is detected. 500 Lumen High Brightness white LED equipped with manual, motion and timer activation.

1080p Full HD Weatherproof Cameras provide crystal clear images. See more details on live video and recordings. Floodlight cameras provide full color at night. No matter day or night, rain or snow, CasaCam provides a high level of home security.

CasaCam Deluxe System uses dual PIR (Heat Motion Detection) and VMD (Video Motion Detection) sensors. Combined PIR and VMD sensors minimize false alarms. Individual PIR and VMD provide better range of motion detection. You can decide to use Combined or Individual control. You can also set up the motion activated Deterrent Light and/or Voice Message. Or manually turn on the Loud Siren.

System supports up to 4 cameras with single, split or quad display. Also compatible with All CasaCam Deluxe 1080p Camera (SKU# VC5000, VC5000L, VC5800 and VC500). Rechargeable battery and 32GB SD card are included. System supports up to 512GB SD card.
description: With over 20 years experience in electronic design, engineering & manufacturing,
CasaCam offers the products you can trust!
